name: places/ChIJrb33EqJZwokRxcSw3DeyRK8
formattedAddress: 44 Union Square E, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 44 Union Square E, New York, NY 10003, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain with pet food & supplies such as toys, beds & pet technology products, plus medication.

originalText.text:
What!? Where did this place come from!? The renovation is amazing. There's a vet, a barber shop, two floors, a specialty restaurant just for animals. Super clean and super well organized. I really wish I lived closer to here I would go all the time!

I really appreciated how well laid out everything was. The quality and stock of items and the variety. They even had seasonal stuff for dogs and cats.

The fish section was also really neat. They have live coral and a really neat selection. Staff was friendly and helpful you could tell they love animals.

originalText.text: This is the fairyland for your beloved pet. A must stop. Lots of options for both dogs and cats. Fun section for fishes and small animals.

text.text: This is the fairyland for your beloved pet. A must stop. Lots of options for both dogs and cats. Fun section for fishes and small animals.

originalText.text:
Grooming is overbooked and the groomers do not listen to the instructions the owners give them.

The groomers seem overwhelmed and just cut all the dogs hair short…. Traumatising the dog and upsetting the customer.

This being the flagship location should have a better way of handling grooming appointments and also listening to what the customer has requested.

Kindly issue me a refund - also her teeth were not brushed and she has a knicks near her hind legs…

originalText.text:
The new Petco Union Square location is unlike any other pet shop.  The grand shop design is spectacular with a variety of pet merchandise, food, and services offered.  We loved seeing familiar and new brands featured and the individual creative section displays for all the small businesses and Reddy lifestyle area.

We enjoyed selecting treats from the pick and choose biscuit cookie trolley bar for dogs upstairs, trying samples at JustFoodForDogs, and our pup having her chilled whipped cream!

The staff were relaxed, friendly, and helpful.  Our pup especially enjoyed meeting them throughout the store.

Our first visit to the shop was excellent and we are excited to be able to stop at this location every time we are in the Union Square area!

We loved seeing familiar and new brands featured and the individual creative section displays for all the small businesses and Reddy lifestyle area.

We enjoyed selecting treats from the pick and choose biscuit cookie trolley bar for dogs upstairs, trying samples at JustFoodForDogs, and our pup having her chilled whipped cream!

The staff were relaxed, friendly, and helpful.  Our pup especially enjoyed meeting them throughout the store.

Our first visit to the shop was excellent and we are excited to be able to stop at this location every time we are in the Union Square area!

originalText.text:
This new location has put an emphasis on pet and pet owner experience. The minute you walk into the store you’re wowed.

You have an all around experience for you and your pet. Having a Vetco clinic in store as well as the needs for your pet is a great experience. You do not have to go from one location to the next to find the proper care, grooming services, food or dog accessories etc. There are more food brand options that the old location did not have before. Brands that you would find in your local pet store.

The location is very inviting, the way it was designed is very nice.
